Funke Adesiyan  bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-enyere Aisha Buhari aka n'ihe omume ụlọ na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.Listen (help·info)
Ọ gara Ulo akwukwoTime and Tide International na  Ibadan City academy, Saint Anne's School, na Oriwu College Ikorodu maka ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na post-elementary ya

O nwere nzere bachelọ na Performing Arts na Diploma na mmúta gbasara iwu na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo. Adesiyan gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri na nduzi ihe nkiri na Ulo mmuta ihe nkiri bu New York Film Academy
Adesiyan malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2003.
N'afọ 2011, Funke Adesiyan sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ maka mkpọsa onye isi ala nke Ibrahim Shekarau

N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye ntụrụndụ nke abụọ meriri ntuli aka, mgbe Desmond Elliot gasịrị.
O sonyere ma merie na ntuli aka afo 2015 Oyo State House of Assembly n'okpuru Parti ndoro ndoro ochichi nke People's Democratik Party.
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Adesiyan dị ka onye na-enyere Aisha Buhari aka n'ihe omume ụlọ na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.
